mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CONSULTING (ID, MEMBER_ID, CONSULTING_TITLE, CONSULTING_CONTENT, CONSULTING_CATEGORY) VALUES(SEQ_CONSULTING.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{consultingTitle}, #{consultingContent}, #{consultingCategory})
